subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Peugeot held the top three spots after the first pit stops at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in France. Audi is seeking a fifth straight victory and it kept the pressure on Peugeot with two of its cars equaling the number of laps.
snippet: Peugeot held the top three spots after the first pit stops at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in France. Audi is seeking a fifth straight victory and it kept the pressure on Peugeot with two of its cars equaling the number of laps.
